thread.title: BRIEF-Longfin Corp's Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm Resigns Engagement With Co

title: BRIEF-Longfin Corp's Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm Resigns Engagement With Co

organizations.name: independent registered public accounting firm resigns engagement with co
accounting firm resigns engagement with co reuters

text:
April 9, 2018 / 6:40 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Longfin Corp's Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm Resigns Engagement With Co Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - LongFin Corp: 
* ON APRIL 5, CO WAS NOTIFIED THAT ITS INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM, COHNREZNICK LLP HAD RESIGNED ITS ENGAGEMENT WITH CO 
* COHNREZNICK ADVISED THE CO THAT "MATERIAL WEAKNESSES IN INTERNAL CONTROL OVER FINANCIAL REPORTING EXISTED" - SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2qlNYUG ] Further company coverage:
